response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 950000}
